ygData.subject: Re: Manifest Destiny
ygData.msgSnippet: The five vehicles drive forward slowly, then Motormaster stands on end, and shifts, transforming into a body section, as it takes to the air, the four cars

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The five vehicles drive forward slowly, then Motormaster stands on end,
and shifts, transforming into a body section, as it takes to the air,
the four cars spiral around him, attaching at different areas, until the
Monster is formed, and lands, causing a tremor from his enormous bulk. 

Megatron looked up, "Menasor, do not let the intruder escape our base."
He turned his attention to the com-link. "You may take a rest until
further notice Nightstrike." Megatron told his soldier.

Menasor looked around, then in a thunderous monotone voice erupted,
"Menasor, rip intruder." as he nealt by the base entrance.
